The British School of Guangzhou Part of The British Schools Group
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
Please be aware the school uniform shop will be open to all parents from 13th to 17th August from 9am to 4pm each day. The uniform shop will be located in the Nanhu Campus gym during this week.
We strongly recommend parents use this 'Uniform Week' to purchase all new uniform items.
If you need further information about uniform, please contact grace.kwan@bsg.org.cn or penny@bsg.org directly.
Kind regards,
Administration Team The British School of Guangzhou World Class Education
